extension.description: A collection of my, best and latest Kodi add-ons and dependencies. [CR][CR]Home for:[CR]Repo of all Repositories, Titlovi.com Unofficial, BauBau Vavoo, BauBau TV PVR, GreenKlik Premium...[CR][CR]Please do NOT post this Repository on Youtube, Facebook, Blogs, or anywhere on the internet, thank you.
extension.disclaimer: This repository nor the addons within does not form part of the Kodi Media Centre. Please do not seek assistance with this repository or the addons from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels. The authors do not host any of the content in these add-ons and take no responsibility for the content found.

extension.description: Quickly and easily install all the best Kodi repositories.[CR][CR](Part of dEXE's Addons Repository)[CR][CR]Instalirajte željeni repozitorijum.[CR]Opciono iz "Information/Dependencies" pristupite instalaciji preporučenih zvaničnih dodataka.
extension.disclaimer: None of the Repos are hosted by this addon. All Repos are the official repositories of the addon developers. The author does not develop or provide any content in these repositories.
